column4: hello everyone - i have an xorg.conf question: When I set my display resolution to 2048x1024 I cannot choose 72Hz as refresh rate, only 60Hz or Auto. How can I add 72Hz for the 2048x1024 resolution? Thanks

hello everyone - i have an xorg.conf question: When I set my display resolution to 2048x1024 I cannot choose 72Hz as refresh rate, only 60Hz or Auto. How can I add 72Hz for the 2048x1024 resolution? Thanks
are you sure your monitor will support that refresh rate at that resolution?
i use 2048x1024 @ 72Hz on my Vista machine with no problem.
